definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane
sleeping cabin on a boat or train
common passenger accommodation in the hold of a ship/steerage

sentences.english: Clean ballast tanks are dedicated to ballasting operations and their contents are not mixed with fuel or oil.
sentences.chinese: 意思就是不装燃油或者原油的专用压在舱。

sentences.english: Which hatch does the shortage of the jute come out of?
sentences.chinese: 黄麻短卸是从哪个舱出来的？

sentences.english: Adrian:Check anyway. I prefer charter flights to commercial ones.
sentences.chinese: 好好查查吧，比起商务舱，我还是偏好包租的座位。

sentences.english: Please get the dunnage materials prepared, otherwise we can't work tonight.
sentences.chinese: 请把垫舱物料准备好，否则今晚我们不能开工。

sentences.english: Receiving one-fifth, and sixth in conjunction with cabin to stay together by the end.
sentences.chinese: 第五联收货单及第六联由配舱人留底。

sentences.english: Wind up the polythene papers on the bottom after all fish meal is discharged in each hold.
sentences.chinese: 每个舱的鱼粉全部卸完后要把舱底的油纸卷起来。

sentences.english: The first two modules of the International Space Station were assembled in December 1998. In the foreground is the Unity module, which was built by the United States.
sentences.chinese: 空间站最早的两个舱是在1998年组装的。

sentences.english: He returned to Eagle and removed his helmet in the repressurized cabin .
sentences.chinese: 他回到鹰号在增压舱摘除宇航帽。

sentences.english: Buy international business and first class fares from consolidators.
sentences.chinese: 在联运公司购买国际航班的商务舱和头等舱机票。

sentences.english: Sounding the tanks and cargo hold bilges adjacent to collision area.
sentences.chinese: 测量碰撞附近的舱柜和货舱污水阱。

sentences.english: At this moment, the klaxon sounded again. The music of departure was heard in the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 这时，汽笛又是一声长鸣，舱中播出了送别的音乐。

sentences.english: Open the pod bay doors, please. HAL.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔，请打开辅助舱通道门。

sentences.english: May I use the satellite network telephone from my stateroom?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在舱房里使用接驳卫星电话吗？

sentences.english: A rd class is a tourist class.
sentences.chinese: 三等舱就是一般游客用的舱座。

sentences.english: Buy a cheap domestic business class seat on a discounter.
sentences.chinese: 在折扣商那里买一张便宜的国内商务舱座位的机票。

sentences.english: Even if two of these were flooded, she would stil be able to float.
sentences.chinese: 即使有两个舱进水，它依旧可以浮在水上。

definition: sleeping cabin on a boat or train
